resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104039</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104039</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>20101316</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Disease Detectors - Partners Video Magazine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Krankheit-Detektoren - 
Partner-Bildschirm-Zeitschrift</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Détecteurs de la Maladie - Magasin de Vidéo 
d'Associés</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Detetores Da Doença - Compartimento Do Vídeo Dos
Sócios</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rivelatori Di Malattia - Scomparto Del Video Dei 
Soci</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανιχνευτές ασθενειών - τηλεοπτικό περιοδικό 
συνεργατών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Detectores De la Enfermedad - Compartimiento Del 
Vídeo De los Socios</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Scientists have developed nanoscale biosensors that can help detect diseases on farms and in hospitals. Disease Detectors is a segment from Partners Video Magazine's latest episode, The Science of Small. To view the entire episode visit: http://www.csrees.usda.gov/newsroom/partners/partners.html</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaftler haben nanoscale Biosensors 
entwickelt, die helfen können, Krankheiten auf Bauernhöfen und in 
den Krankenhäusern zu entdecken. Krankheit-Detektoren ist ein 
Segment von der neuesten Episode der Partner-videozeitschrift, die 
Wissenschaft von kleinem. Den gesamten Episodebesuch ansehen: 
http://www.csrees.usda.gov/newsroom/partners/partners.html</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les scientifiques ont développé les 
biodétecteurs de nanoscale qui peuvent aider à détecter les 
maladies aux fermes et dans les hôpitaux. Les détecteurs de la
maladie est un segment épisode du magazine visuel d'associés du 
dernier, la Science de petit. Pour visualiser la visite entière
d'épisode : 
http://www.csrees.usda.gov/newsroom/partners/partners.html</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os cientistas desenvolveram os biosensors do 
nanoscale que podem ajudar detectar doenças em fazendas e nos 
hospitais. Os detetores da doença são um segmento do episode o
mais atrasado do compartimento video dos sócios, a ciência de 
pequeno. Para ver a visita inteira do episode: 
http://www.csrees.usda.gov/newsroom/partners/partners.html</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli scienziati hanno sviluppato i biosensori del 
nanoscale che possono contribuire a diagnosticare le malattie sui 
poderi ed in ospedali. I rivelatori di malattia è un segmento 
episodio del video scomparto dei soci dall'ultimo, la scienza di 
piccolo. Per osservare l'intera chiamata di episodio: 
http://www.csrees.usda.gov/redazione/partners/partners.html</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι επιστήμονες έχουν αναπτύξει nanoscale τους 
βιοαισθητήρες που μπορούν να βοηθήσουν να ανιχνεύσουν τις 
ασθένειες στα αγροκτήματα και στα νοσοκομεία. Οι ανιχνευτές 
ασθενειών είναι ένα τμήμα μνήμης από το πιό πρόσφατο 
επεισόδιο του τηλεοπτικού περιοδικού συνεργατών, η επιστήμη 
μικρού. Για να εμφανίσει την ολόκληρη επίσκεψη επεισοδίου: 
http://www.csrees.usda.gov/αίθουσα τύπου/partners/partners.html</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los científicos han desarrollado los biosensores 
del nanoscale que pueden ayudar a detectar enfermedades en granjas y 
en hospitales. Los detectores de la enfermedad son un segmento 
del episodio más último del compartimiento video de los socios, la 
ciencia de pequeño. Para visión la visita entera del episodio:
http://www.csrees.usda.gov/redacción/partners/partners.html</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:CSREES
FN:CSREES
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>

VERSION:3.0

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104039</entry>
